snippet: Lawyers in the case against Khalid Shaikh Mohammed and four others said they worry that their communications may be subject to government monitoring.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers in the case against Khalid Shaikh Mohammed and four others said they worry that their communications may be subject to government monitoring.

headline.main: 9/11 Case Is Delayed as Defense Voices Fears on Eavesdropping
